page.title: 07EDUCATION
page.content: Tintern School, which was built in 1840, closed in 1985.Primary aged pupils must now travel to Llandogo, four miles to the north.Secondary pupils travel to Kingsmark Comprehensive School in Chepstow unless parents wish to educate them privately at Monmouth. During the lifetime of Tintern School numbers grew to 109 pupils when the school had to be enlarged,but fell to 22 at closure.Unfortunately the school was built over the path of a stream and,at one stage,a cavern was found to exist below the P.E. shed.Flooding occurred on a number of occasions.
